entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:17 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

Temperature: -0.2°C

Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 94 %

Dewpoint: -1.0°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle or freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 9:16 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:16 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
